data.name: KeepUp Survival - Red Desert Map
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains:

A small additional Red Desert Map. Explore this cute little map, go hunting and build a nice shelter.

This product requires the Steam version of the main game KeepUp Survival to play.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC pack contains:

A small additional Red Desert Map. Explore this cute little map, go hunting and build a nice shelter.

This product requires the Steam version of the main game KeepUp Survival to play.
data.short_description: A small additional Red Desert Map. Explore this cute little map, go hunting and build a nice shelter.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, French, Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 940 4GB or better
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play
